divs: Sighting DetailsAs I was watching the sky on Sunday evening, I noticed a very bright light moving from the south to the north this was to high to be a plane (no strobes visible)and to low to be a satellite and was very bright, I called for my daughter-in-law too come and see.She ran out and saw the light moving through the sky(she is 23 years old)and very,very fast!We noticed it began to slow down, then it STOPPED! We could not believe our eyes! It STOPPED! The light began too dim, then it was gone! It blended in with the rest of the stars! This ended up at the handle of the big Dipper. I don't know if it's just a coincidence but some-one witnessed a similar event in Colorado,the same night,and posted it on this web-site ,how strange.I witnessed this whole episode with my binoculars.Believe me you can see a lot more with binoculars than you can by your naked eye.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Capitola
There were no other sightings in Capitola on or around June 17th 2007
